It show TMS , TBS , tDCS CPNS successfully modulate motor function healthy volunteer , well patient neurological disorder stroke . One fundamental problem optimal parameter stimulation modulate motor function technique know . The purpose protocol explore within safe guideline , effect different stimulation parameter motor cortical function , oscillatory brain dynamic measure magnetoencephalography ( MEG ) electroencephalography ( EEG ) , eye movement , fMRI activation . In addition , protocol use train new fellow come NINDS Human Cortical Physiology Section ( HCPS ) use TMS , TBS , tDCS , CPNS technique . We expect information emerge study allow u 1 ) optimize stimulation parameter collect pilot data healthy volunteer future patient-oriented hypothesis-driven protocols,2 ) collect pilot data power analysis future patient-oriented hypothesis driven protocol , 3 ) train new fellow use different method . Study Population Up 1000 healthy volunteer , age 18 old . Design Healthy volunteer receive one follow type stimulation alone combination : ( 1 ) 1 Hz TMS 30mins 115 % rest motor threshold intensity ( MT ) . These parameter use single-pulse TMS paired-pulse TMS . Parameters single-pulse TMS paired-pulse TMS variable depend sub-study . For paired pulse , duration TMS pulse 1 msec . Interval pulse 20 sec intensity stimulation 100 % stimulator output depend sub-study . ( 2 ) TBS 100 % active MT ; ( 3 ) tDCS 2 mA 60mins ( 4 ) CPNS intensities 130 % peripherally-elicited-motor-threshold 2 hour . All parameter stimulation procedure safely use previously report literature . Sham stimulation deliver modality . Each subject may undergo 20 session space least one day , depend particular exploration . To verify number session per subject exceed 20 session , number session per participant track across substudies use CTDB . The AIs responsible enter CTDB subjects/visits . We test effect different form stimulation motor cortical excitability , simple motor task , functional neuroimaging measure . Some stimulation may conduct , , fMRI scan , eye movement recording , MEG and/or EEG record session . To identify possible contribution sub-cortical structure , also measure M-wave , F-wave , and/or H-Reflexes . The goal exploratory study obtain preliminary information effect various combination central peripheral nervous system stimulation would allow u develop subsequent , finely tune , hypothesis-driven protocol . Under protocol , conduct : Exploratory Sub-studies . These substudies exploratory nature conduct order develop information generate well informed hypothesis and/or power analysis . We set upper limit 40 subject per sub-study . Hypothesis-Testing Sub-studies . Hypothesis-testing sub-studies study specific hypothesis test . DOC.brief_title: Modulation Motor Function Stimulation Central Peripheral Nervous System
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives Noninvasive stimulation central peripheral nervous system , include transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) , theta-burst TMS ( TBS ) , transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) cutaneous/peripheral nerve stimulation ( CPNS ) alone pair TMS ( pair associative stimulation , PAS ) , increasingly use investigation cortical plasticity possible adjuvant strategy neurorehabilitation . It show TMS , TBS , tDCS CPNS successfully modulate motor function healthy volunteer , well patient neurological disorder stroke . One fundamental problem optimal parameter stimulation modulate motor function technique know . The purpose protocol explore within safe guideline , effect different stimulation parameter motor cortical function , oscillatory brain dynamic measure magnetoencephalography ( MEG ) electroencephalography ( EEG ) , eye movement , fMRI activation . In addition , protocol use train new fellow come NINDS Human Cortical Physiology Section ( HCPS ) use TMS , TBS , tDCS , CPNS technique . We expect information emerge study allow u 1 ) optimize stimulation parameter collect pilot data healthy volunteer future patient-oriented hypothesis-driven protocols,2 ) collect pilot data power analysis future patient-oriented hypothesis driven protocol , 3 ) train new fellow use different method . Study Population Up 1000 healthy volunteer , age 18 old . Design Healthy volunteer receive one follow type stimulation alone combination : ( 1 ) 1 Hz TMS 30mins 115 % rest motor threshold intensity ( MT ) . These parameter use single-pulse TMS paired-pulse TMS . Parameters single-pulse TMS paired-pulse TMS variable depend sub-study . For paired pulse , duration TMS pulse 1 msec . Interval pulse 20 sec intensity stimulation 100 % stimulator output depend sub-study . ( 2 ) TBS 100 % active MT ; ( 3 ) tDCS 2 mA 60mins ( 4 ) CPNS alone intensities 130 % peripherally-elicited-motor-threshold 2 hour . When CPNS pair TMS , upper limit 300 % sensory threshold . All parameter stimulation procedure safely use previously report literature . Sham stimulation deliver modality . Each subject may undergo 20 session . A single session may last long 8 hour allow initial test paradigm follow retests perform component substudy later day . Appropriate rest break meal break occur long sessions.Subjects participate one experimental session per day . The 20 experimental session schedule ten-year period . To verify number session per subject exceed 20 session , number session per participant track across substudies use CTDB . The AIs responsible enter CTDB subjects/sessions . We test effect different form stimulation motor cortical excitability , simple motor task , functional neuroimaging measure . Some stimulation may conduct , , fMRI scan , eye movement recording , MEG and/or EEG record session . To identify possible contribution sub-cortical structure , also measure M-wave , F-wave , and/or H-Reflexes . The goal exploratory study obtain preliminary information effect various combination central peripheral nervous system stimulation would allow u develop subsequent , finely tune , hypothesis-driven protocol . Under protocol , conduct : Exploratory Sub-studies . These substudies exploratory nature conduct order develop information generate well informed hypothesis and/or power analysis . We set upper limit 40 subject per sub-study . Hypothesis-Testing Sub-studies . Hypothesis-testing sub-studies study specific hypothesis test . These sub-studies undergo statistical PIRC review 6 subject per group ( e.g. , 12 subject , 6 per arm , two group study ) , additional subject recruit . Together , P.I . PIRC decide whether continue sub-study subject without amendment whether amendment protocol would necessary . A memo request review hypothesis-testing sub-studies possible additional enrollment ( beyond 6 ) send PIRC statistical reviewer . In addition sub-study type , protocol use train new investigator optimize various technique experimental approach ( e.g. , appropriate MRI sequence , parameter TMS stimulation , behavioral training duration ) . We devise strategy ensure sub-study engages procedure authorize protocol consent form scientifically valuable . First , investigator submits sub-study proposal PI describe rationale , method , technique and/or behavioral task . The PI meet investigator Protocol Coordinator ( PC ) discuss sub-study make sure procedure allow protocol consent form . Subsequently , PI discuss time pilot PIRC chair suggestion incorporate accordingly . The status sub-study report IRB time continue review .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Willingness ability give consent 3 . Normal neurological examination 4 . Clearly dominant handedness ( right left ) assess Handedness scale EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Any severe progressive neurological disorder severe medical condition , history seizure 2 . Chronic use medication act primarily central nervous system , low seizure threshold significantly alter cortical excitability antipsychotic drug ( chlorpromazine , clozapine ) , tricyclic antidepressant , prescription stimulant . 3 . Pacemakers implant electrical device , brain stimulators , type dental implant , aneurysm clip ( metal clip wall large artery ) , metallic prosthesis ( include metal pin rod , heart valve , cochlear implant ) , permanent eyeliner , implanted delivery pump , shrapnel fragment 4 . Diagnosis drug dependence make health care provider ( ICD9CM code 304 ) 5 . Staff section
